alert.note: Alert for Burleigh; Emmons; Morton (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 01 at 10:23PM CDT until August 01 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN BURLEIGH...EAST CENTRAL MORTON AND NORTHWESTERN EMMONS COUNTIES... At 1023 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 13 miles southeast of Lincoln, or 16 miles southeast of Bismarck, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Burleigh, east central Morton and northwestern Emmons Counties, including the following locations... Hazelton Recreation Area, Moffit, Fort Rice, Stumpf State Natural Area and Huff. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
